item.title: Investigator (Level 5)
item.description: Used git blame to annotates a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 9)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 9)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Author (Level 9)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 8)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 6)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Architect (Level 4)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Collector (Level 6)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Master Banker (Level 8)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 2)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 1)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Goldsmith (Level 6)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 8)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 1)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Cleaning lady (Level 5)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Pilgrim (Level 3)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Investigator (Level 4)
item.description: Used git blame to annotates a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 7)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Merchant (Level 4)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Presenter (Level 8)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show
